price: 18. (Fircoon) wuxuu yidhi: Ma waanaan kugu barbaarin dhexdayada adigoo ilmo yar ah? Oo aad nala joogin sannado badan ka mid ah cimrigaaga?
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدٗا وَلَبِثۡتَ فِينَا مِنۡ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla alam nurabbika fīnā walīdan walabith'ta fīnā min ʿumurika sinīna
